asset_guid.description: The Global Unique Identifier generated for each asset

status.description: The current status of an asset

multi_specimen.description: A single image (or other type of media) that contains multiple specimens in it. One asset is linked to multiple specimens

specimens.description: A list of specimen objects with the following information: institution, collection, preparation_type, barcode and specimen_pid

funding.description: A short description of funding source used to create the asset

subject.description: We will need to distinguish between image of a folder, device target, specimen, label etc)

payload_type.description: What the asset represents (image, ct scan, surface scan, document)

asset_locked.description: Flags if it is possible to edit / delete the media of this asset

audited.description: Records if the asset has been manually audited

created_date.description: Date and time the asset metadata was uploaded

date_metadata_updated.description: Date and time the asset metadata was last updated

date_asset_taken.description: Date and time when the original raw image was taken

date_asset_deleted.description: Date and time the asset was marked as deleted in the metadata

date_asset_finalised.description: Date and time the asset was pushed to Specify

date_metadata_taken.description: Date and time of when the original raw image was taken

institution.description: The name of the institution which owns and digitised the specimen

parent_guid.description: Name of the parent media (in most cases, the same as original_parent_name, it can be different if it is a derivative of a derivative)

collection.description: The collection name within the institution that holds the specimen

internal_status.description: An internal status field used to track the status of the upload of related media

updateUser.description: Username of the person that updated the asset

digitiser.description: The name of the person who imaged the specimens (creating the assets)

workstation.description: The name of the workstation used to do the imaging

pipeline.description: The name of the pipeline that sent a create, update or delete request to the storage service

error_message.description: If an error happened during digitisation of the asset an error message can be displayed here
error_message.example: Failed to upload to ERDA: connection reset

error_timestamp.description: Date and time that the error happened

user.description: Username of the user that initiated the event

pipeline.description: name of the pipeline that started the event

workstation.description: name of the workstation that was used

HttpInfo.description: The location on the storage where asset media can be uploaded

institution.description: The name of the institution to which the collection belong

name.description: The name of the institution which owns and digitised the specimen

institution.description: The institution that the pipeline belongs to

institution_name.description: The institution that where the workstation is located
